The washing pressure is excellent, waxed and very good (about 3 minutes for each euro). They are super nice and let fill with water if you wash the van. They do not have a specific emptying area for motorhomes (gray and black water), but they have a bathroom. Great place recommended before entering the island of Arousa or preparing the trip by leaving it.

description: Bay parking next to very quiet road next to beach. showers but no services. many beautiful beaches within walking didtance and many bars and seafood restaurants on the other beaches. the parking bays are quite small and the roads to the beach are also very small...if you go wrong...highly recommended for smaller vans and campers. no signs prohibiting motorhomes or overnight parking. busy on weekends

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 14 Aldea Laxe
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 14 Aldea Laxe
description: Private motorhome area located 400m from the beach, totally closed plot and guarded 24 hours. Electricity in pitches, toilets with hot water in showers, sinks, washing machine, barbecue area, completely flat pitches. A great place to spend a few days of relaxation and tranquility in an unbeatable environment. CHECK-IN To check-in you need ID and credit card. It is done using an automatic machine where, if the instructions are followed correctly, it is a simple process: 1. Select the number of nights you want to spend the night. 2. Choose the plot, (check size) and if you need electricity or not. 3. Scan your ID (place the document photo face up) and press READ. 4. Press pay to make the payment. 5. Make the payment with your card by passing it through the reader or entering it in the dataphone (marking your pin on it) The machine will issue you your payment ticket, ticket with information about the plot and the access card, which you have to go through the reader located at the barriers to enter. With this card you can enter and leave the area as many times as you want during your stay. RENEWAL OF STAY: If you want to renew your stay, make a check out in the machine before ending the current stay (options - checkout) Then make a new check-in.

title: (15928) Rianxo - 130 Lugar Brion
description: Parking on land, a few meters from the beach and poly-clean access to the beach, a shady place with little slope. Motorhomes and fancy vans please keep it clean, it does get busy in the evenings but there is usually space

name: Camping Rianxo

description: Rianxo, 82 Rua Cortes. "Ranxio", a small campsite by the sea. Family friendly. Very calm. Tree climbing on the adjoining land. Small restaurant near the reception. French understood but little spoken. Very shady. perfect for a stopover. 2nd category. Correct sanitary facilities.

title: (36988) Camping las Moreiras
description: Very small plots. Decent bathrooms and services. Noisy camp at night, until 00:00 there were children playing and shouting a lot.

title: (36618) Vilagarcía de Arousa - 63 Rúa Campanario
description: Distance to Rio Ulla campsite about 100 m. Large parking without restriction. Cemetery and beach. Building toilets, drinking water outside, sandy beach, also suitable for children and dogs. Extremely quiet, if bathers are gone. Picnic - tables Beautiful view of the water!

name: Bungalows Camping Barraña
title: (15992) Bungalows Camping Barraña
description: Boiro, 62 Rúa Acceso Praia. Camping Barraña Boiro, 50 meters from the beach and in a privileged area.

title: (15920) Rianxo - Paseo da Ribeira
description: Quiet place, next to the fishing port, to spend the night and visit the beautiful town of Rianxo

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 3 Rua Castelao
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 3 Rua Castelao
description: Large parking area but quite busy. Ideal to visit A Pobra for the day and enjoy the area of bars and restaurants. We do not sleep in this place (we do not know if you can either)

title: (36988) - 20 Lugar Gandariña
description: Small parking lot next to a cove nice quiet place to spend the day we were there in April it was empty

name: Camping Rioulla
title: (36618) Camping Rioulla
description: Nice family campsite with swimming pool and separate pool for toddlers/preschoolers. Small camping shop with essentials incl. Bread. Beautiful view of estuary and sunset.

title: (36637) Galicia - 29 Lugar Zacande
description: Zacande soccer field parking (Meis), quiet place to spend the night. Next to the town and the Pazo de La Saleta. Wide and easy access from the PO-300.

title: (15920) Rianxo - 4 Rúa Arcos Moldes
description: Very complete hardware store and with spare bottles camping Gaz of all kinds

title: (36639) Cambados - Aldea o Facho
description: Ample parking space where Antea was a playground. Next to a soccer field and right by the sea. Quiet sleeping place under maple trees.

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rúa San Lázaro
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rúa San Lázaro
description: Parking next to the pier, large sites and very quiet, town center 5 minutes away

title: (15985) Rianxo - 6 Rúa Arcos Moldes
description: Self-service laundry, washing machine, dryer.

title: (36616) Pontevedra - Unnamed road
description: Parking next to the river Umia, called Natural Space "As Aceñas", a quiet place where they enter as 8 AC. Flat, quiet parking, with a walk along the river, and about 20m there is a table to eat. It has no service, it is quite clean.

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 13 Rúa San Lázaro
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 13 Rúa San Lázaro
description: Parking with site almost always.

title: (15992) Boiro - 92 Urbanización Escarabote
description: Port of Escarabote. Quiet place. Has a water fountain. On the other side, next to a bus stop, it has a small beach with a shower and a chemical toilet. Very central. Space for several vehicles.

title: (15959) Insuela - 14 Rúa Esteirón
description: Land parking to spend the day

title: (36988) - 6 Lugar Gandariña
description: Quiet place on the beach where to spend the night, in mid-September there was no problem sleeping in the van. there are areas with shade in the morning, public toilets that close at night, and several beach bars where you can have a drink, it is not crowded but at rush hour it can be difficult to park

title: (15992) Boiro - 49 Lugar Peralto
description: Super equipped laundry!! I pay both in cash and by card. Very comfortable service. The area is very nice and pleasant to wait while doing the laundry. Very good prices. It has a bakery opposite, a playground and cafeterias next door. Highly recommended.

title: (36988) El Grove - 16 As Pipas
description: Place to spend the day and night. There is space for 4 vans or motorhomes. Right in front of the beach.

title: (15959) Insuela - 2 Rúa Esteirón
description: Very nice picnic area overlooking the bay and the beach!

title: (36988) - 15C Lugar Gandariña
description: Parking between Praia area das Pipas and Praia Mexilloeira. Good views and next to two beautiful coves. You can stay overnight. Very calm. Maximum 4 campers and slight unevenness of the ground. Two minutes from a beach bar and Praia das Pipas area. I totally recommend it.

title: (15992) Boiro - 44 Aldea Magdalena
description:
Very cozy and quiet, ideal for families with children. The town is very close and has good shade, a picnic area and a park for children's games.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1 Approach the barrier so that it opens.
2 Park.
3 Go to the payment machine, enter the days of stay.
4 Pay with credit/debit card.

title: (15992) Boiro - 125 Rúa Principal
description: Self-service laundry and DIA Supermarket

title: (15930) Boiro - 4 Avenida da Constitución
description: Self-service laundry

title: (36988) O Grove - EP-9102
description: Nearby picnic area with tables and barbecue. In the picnic area there are a couple of garbage. Good views of the Ría de Arousa. Quiet to spend the night.

title: (36988) - 14 Lugar Gandariña
description: Parking serving the beaches. Beautiful area. Magnificent view. No service. Nice beach next door. Nudist beach nearby (but not in sight). On the other hand a lot of wind. The corner is famous for the practice of kite surfing is not for nothing.

title: (15930) Boiro - 16 Aldea Boiro
description: Drinking water point

title: (36988) - 14 Lugar Gandariña
description: Very quiet, several coves in a row, and a path to walk, no showers or bathrooms

title: (36615) Caldas de Reyes - 11 N-640
description: Service station with water service and gray water emptying. It also has a spare gas bottle. The water tap has a great hose with a lot of pressure. Service station for gasoline with grocery store.

title: (15938) Boiro - 57 Calle Cimadevila
description: LPG service station

title: (36618) Bamio - 58 Lugar Pedroso
description: It usually has propane bottles. They do not have to be from Repsol, collect cylinders from any other brand. Plus they are super friendly.

title: (36988) A Lanzada - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to spend the night. There is the road next to it but there is almost no traffic.

title: (36988) O Grove - Unnamed Road
description: Place for 2 vans along the sea between 2 beaches. Quiet with beautiful landscape. Direct access to the beach. ideal start for kayaking and to observe the shell farms more closely. No amenities.

name: Camping Coroso
title: (15959) Camping Coroso
description: Camping Coroso

title: (15985) Rianxo - 5 Lugar Burato
description: Quiet parking, we spent one night. A little incline and with recently pruned trees that may make it difficult to walk when they have branches. Beach just in front. There is a beautiful walk to Rianxo for all levels and bikes and also a route that goes to the bottom of the estuary, although it is more complicated, it is worth it, walking or mountain biking.

title: () Meaño - Aldea Altamira
description: Outdoor parking between trees and pond, near a kind of museum. Access from a dirt road accessible to CC. Nice point of view and free dump station nearby (see on park4night map)

name: Camping Os Fieitás
title: (36988) Camping Os Fieitás
description: Os Fieitas Campsite

title: (36617) Caldas de Reis - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place for two caravans with a river next to it, drinking water, barbecue and tables. in the midst of nature.

title: (36967) Meaño - 10T Lugar Altamira
description: Os Pasales recreational area. 15 large parking spaces for vans, among shady trees. On the side of the area, next to the road, they can fit 2 AC parked in line. In the area there is a soccer field, paddle tennis court, 2 taps, stone tables and grills, benches, wastebaskets, and a wooden box with books to read (please put them back in their place). Gray discharge area a few meters next to the treatment plant.

title: (36967) Meaño - 12 Aldea Altamira
description: Gray and black water drainage area only, in the Dena area nearby you have a place to rest, a playground, a river walk and two minutes from supermarkets and cafes. The bin doesn’t get emptied very often so please empty any rubbish with food waste elsewhere so as not to attract lots of flies.

title: (36988) A Igrexa - 3 Lugar a Igrexa
description: Parking to visit the nearby beaches and ruins. Large spaces for motorhomes - spaces uneven, not for night. Beautiful beach at less than 100m

title: (36988) O Grove - 21 PO-317
description: Arrive first thing in the morning. Good place watching the sea. Ground parking. Shadow if you arrive on time

title: (36988) El Grove - PO-317
description: Ample free parking, there are very clean public toilets. There is the possibility of taking a shower at a nearby campsite, 18 minutes away on foot for an affordable price.

title: (15968) - 7 Rúa dos Estudantes
description: Motorhome parking in Ribeira on the urban beach of Coroso, 1 km from the center of Ribeira, connected by a promenade and a bike path to the center of Ribeira. It has drinking water service. Natural environment in the shade of large trees a few steps from the sand of the beach. It has a beach bar (Chiringuito Quimera) where they program live music in the afternoons after the beach. Gas station just 200 meters away, also selling butane gas. We do not have gray and black water discharge. We would like to have more services but we are not allowed to do more due to the coastal location.

title: (36967) A Eirexe - 3 Rúa Ramón Cabanillas
description: Free parking. Very large, many seats. Semi-asphalted ground, completely level. Very calm. Supermarket, laundry, restaurants, bars, etc. It does not have loading and unloading of water. Perfect for a stop along the way

name: Camping Paisaxe II
title: (36988) Camping Paisaxe II
description: Camping Paisax II

title: (15938) Bermo - 11 Aldea Bermo
description: Showers in the Shell service station restaurant. important for vans. very friendly staff.

name: Camping & Glamping Muiñeira
title: (36988) Camping & Glamping Muiñeira
description: Small campsite with magnificent views. It has two areas, one on the beach and the other in a wooded area. Both areas have bathroom modules (very clean), sinks and laundry rooms. It has a washing machine and dryer. Free WIFI in the cafeteria. Nice treatment by the owners.

name: Camping Sol y Mar
title: (36988) Camping Sol y Mar
description: Sol y Mar Campsite

title: (36988) San Vicente do Grove - 23 Lugar a Lanzada
title_short: (36988) San Vicente do Grove - 23 Lugar a Lanzada
description: Street with parking next to the Del Mar water. I don't know if you can stay the night but the place is beautiful. Better to go into reverse to park at the end of the street.

title: (36988) O Grove - PO-316
description: Huge car park on the Lanzada beach. It is asphalt and without shade. If you get closer to the beach you can't hear the road. There is WC during the day.

title: (36988) El Grove - 2a O Carreiro
description: Beachfront parking. With a no parking sign from 11 p.m. to 8 a.m.

title: (36192) Armenteira - 53B Lugar a Vilar
description: Pilgrims hostel parking. Always accessible. Great place to see the monastery. Bar O Comercio, potato omelette. Not leveled. Drinking water is available.

title: (15968) Ribeira - 4 Rúa dos Estudantes
description: Car parks behind the institutes, in front of the beach at the end of the street, a quiet place, be careful to park the caravan well in the parking lines, there is a local police fine in front of you, there is also a beach bar where you can have a slush and have a quiet drink, go around the roundabout and enter along the street that is in front and continue to the left there is a sports pavilion and to the right a school follow the street and you have two esplanades to park your car.

name: Camping O Curro
title: (36988) Camping O Curro
description: O Curro Campsite

title: (36988) O Carreiro - 2 Rua Carreiro
description: Very idyllic place, past the parking lots straight into the dirt road. Achtung ehr offroad, VW-lang has done it but only with sweat at dry way. Do not leave awning at night or leave chairs open. Police arrive at night to check. 1, max 2 nights.

title: (36988) El Grove - 80 PO-317
description: Parking on the side of the road / street. You will have shade and many restaurants to eat. The beach is not supervised but it is great if you go with family.

title: (15960) O Touro - 52 Lugar Touro
description: Free parking, beautiful view by the beach, showers on the beach. I stayed overnight with no problems.

title: (15960) O Touro - 8 DP-7307
description: Along the road, beach show toilets at 200m. Location near Santa Uxía de Ribeiro

title: (15960) Ribeira - 2 Rúa Castillejos
description: Ample parking on the shore of the promenade. It has shadow. The road is next, there is noise from cars so I do not recommend it for overnight. Leisure area and shops, next door

title: (36192) Armenteria - 3 Lugar a Caroi
description: Small car park, perfect for visiting the monastery and for mountain bike departures

title: (36988) O Grove - EP-9101
description: Parking for 2 or 3 motorhomes. Close to the sea with chaos of rocks. You cannot stay overnight or park from 11:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m.

title: (15968) Ribeira - 10 Estrada Dean Grande
description: Free parking a few meters from the sea line. During the day it is frequented by some cars but at night it is almost deserted. Very quiet and close to Coroso beach

title: () Riveira - Porto Grande Ribeira
description: Parking on the harbor Nice place, sea view and port, a little noisy in the morning from the buses parked at the end of the car park, free

title: (15948) A Aldea Vella - CP-6705
description: Next to the main parking lot of A curotiña, next to a horse trough on the ground. Magnificent view and close to the RP.02B path (which connects with A and with PRG263).

title: (15966) Ribeira - 74 Lugar Ameixida
description: Small parking by the beach, chirringuito, shower, picnic table, swing and slide. Not spent the night but surely possible, no ban reported. Super view!

name: Camping O Espiño
title: (36988) Camping O Espiño
description: Camping O Espiño. Familiar and calm, shady pitches. Very friendly staff. Reserve bread in the store. Very good. Accepted animals.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: Mirador parking with magnificent views of the sea and Arousa Island. You can go up again, for the landscape and sleep under the pines

name: Restaurante Miami Praia
title: (36988) Restaurante Miami Praia
description: Camping Miami Playa

title: () Riveira - 53 Avenida Malecón
description: Very large parking in the port, perfect for visiting the town. It has no services.

title: (36988) O Grove - 98 PO-317
description: The place is very beautiful. In front pines and the ports. It's quiet. But it has nothing of taps showers etc. It's a sand parking

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: Amazing place to visit. Beautiful views

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: All in height on the view of the sea and sunset next to the meadows where there are horses and cows. Without services and take away your waste

title: (36692) Barro - 42 Lugar Fonte de Curro
description: Gas station with emptying and filling of water

title: (36192) Pontevedra - Unnamed Road
description: Golf parking and departure of a mountain bike circuit of 7km (easy). I went to ask the reception of golf, which is also Info VTT, if there was opportunity to spend the night on the parking to do the circuit in the morning, and allowed me without any problem.

title: (36988) O Grove - 40 Paseo Monte da Garda
title_short: (36988) O Grove - 40 Paseo Monte da Garda
description: cars pass

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: View of the sea and the setting sun sinking into it. Right on a street with little traffic at least at night. Further up the road comes a nice lookout point with picnic areas.

title: (36990) - 173 Lugar a Lanzada
description: Huge parking for people who go to the huge beach of La Lanzada. No sign. Today we will sleep here together. 6 AC more.

title: (36612) Catoira - 16 Avenida Muiños de Vento
description: Beautiful site on the outskirts of Catoira. We slept on a Friday night and no problem. When you get to the lake, there is a path where you go up the hill, we went with a 4x4 but I think it can be accessed with any vehicle!

name: Lyoko Camper Park
title: (36190) Lyoko Camper Park
description:
Motorhome area located in Galicia (Pontevedra). The place is in a strategic location, with everything very close (beaches, towns, restaurants, etc...). Finally, we have all the necessary services for your motorhome and your family.

USE THE COORDINATES TO OBTAIN THE EXACT LOCATION.

title: (36990) Sanjenjo - PO-308
description: Space with grass and camping tables for AC. In front of La Lanzada beach, there is a parking lot at the top for cars and a little further on is the entrance for this space. It does not have the views of the top, but it is quieter.

title: (36988) Os Campos - 2 Lugar Temprans
description: Parking on the left a little high before the large parking lot, magnificent view of the water and rocks.

title: (36692) Barro - 22 Lugar Fonte de Curro
description: Small parking lot in which we spend the night without any problem, in front there is a furancho in which we eat octopus, saw, etc. rich and at a good price

title: (36612) Catoira - 21 Avenida Muiños de Vento
description: Next to a disused quarry that is now a beautiful lake for swimming and for the animals to enjoy. There are two accesses to the place, the first one that you find is bad for going up with the AC and the second a little further on with which you get to the site well. quiet area with the possibility of bathing and walks. our motorhome is 7m and it arrived without problem. !!!!!!!There are two paths through which you can climb. one steep and full of potholes and another that is feasible to go with a large motorhome, see well on Google Maps or go down and look for the road before taking the first one you see !!!!!!

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 3 Lugar Iglesario
description: Large parking lot across from the church and cemetery. Quiet road, nice view to the north.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - PO-308
description: Spectacular place to spend the day. Camping or spending the night is not allowed by order of SEPRONA, the Civil Guard passes by and if you have chairs or a table outside, they will fine you directly because you can only park. And if you stay overnight the Civil Guard will wake you up in the middle of the night with the gift of a fine and have to leave in the middle of the night

title: (36612) Catoira - 22 Lugar tras Da Veiga
description: Historic windmills parking. Place with panoramic views. It is very quiet and alone.
